shralptide2

Simple tides on your iOS and Apple Watch devices.

View on GitHub

Privacy Policy

ShralpTide 2 runs self contained on your iOS and Apple Watch devices. It does not require registration, login or communicate information to a server for any reason.

Please follow the link below to read our privacy policy in PDF format. Feel free to download or print this document for your records.

Open PDF
